Entries.DialogueText: 你好！我是格斯，星果酒吧的老板兼主厨。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好！我是格斯，星果酒吧的老板兼主厨。

Entries.DialogueText: 需要提神的话可以光临我的店。这里有的是热咖啡和冰啤酒。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 需要提神的话可以光临我的店。这里有的是热咖啡和冰啤酒。

Entries.DialogueText: 哇，谢谢你！我很想一下子喝完，不过还得留一点给酒吧，我肯定能用这个做出一款独特的鸡尾酒！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哇，谢谢你！我很想一下子喝完，不过还得留一点给酒吧，我肯定能用这个做出一款独特的鸡尾酒！

Entries.DialogueText: （闻了一下）……啊，真是美味佳肴。{Farmer_Name}，你很懂我喜欢的东西嘛。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: （闻了一下）……啊，真是美味佳肴。，你很懂我喜欢的东西嘛。

Entries.DialogueText: （嗅、嗅）……这刺鼻的气味！
Entries.DisplayPattern: （嗅、嗅）……这刺鼻的气味！

Entries.DialogueText: （咕噜咕噜）……这热情的味道！这粗糙的质感！
Entries.DisplayPattern: （咕噜咕噜）……这热情的味道！这粗糙的质感！

Entries.DialogueText: 只能是美食家番茄盐了！我来跟你做个交易吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 只能是美食家番茄盐了！我来跟你做个交易吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 我昨晚看了天气预报，给我吓了一跳！ {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我昨晚看了天气预报，给我吓了一跳！

Entries.DialogueText: 外面有怪物吗？发生什么事了？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 外面有怪物吗？发生什么事了？

Entries.DialogueText: 幸好都结束了，开酒吧的事情已经很多了，可别给我整什么诡异天气了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 幸好都结束了，开酒吧的事情已经很多了，可别给我整什么诡异天气了！

Entries.DialogueText: （闻了一下）……这场雨有一股特别的味道，你闻到了吗？像是刚切碎的药草……
Entries.DisplayPattern: （闻了一下）……这场雨有一股特别的味道，你闻到了吗？像是刚切碎的药草……

Entries.DialogueText: 刘易斯跟我说你种的番茄已经成熟了，那真是太好了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 刘易斯跟我说你种的番茄已经成熟了，那真是太好了！

Entries.DialogueText: ……假如美食界没有番茄，那可太惨了……
Entries.DisplayPattern: ……假如美食界没有番茄，那可太惨了……

Entries.DialogueText: 大家能吃上健康美味的饭菜，这是我重要的心愿，很遗憾这对一些人来说还是一件奢侈的事情。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 大家能吃上健康美味的饭菜，这是我重要的心愿，很遗憾这对一些人来说还是一件奢侈的事情。

Entries.DialogueText: 你好啊，{Farmer_Name}，希望你和%spouse能过得开心。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好啊，，希望你和%spouse能过得开心。

Entries.DialogueText: 艾米丽最近精神得不得了……你们怎么了？（眨眨眼）
Entries.DisplayPattern: 艾米丽最近精神得不得了……你们怎么了？（眨眨眼）

Entries.DialogueText: 哎，听说你离婚了，我很遗憾…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎，听说你离婚了，我很遗憾……

Entries.DialogueText: 欢迎多来酒吧，这里有人陪你。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 欢迎多来酒吧，这里有人陪你。

Entries.DialogueText: 又经历了一次失败的婚姻吗？唉，有些事情确实无法避免。感觉之后会经常在酒吧见到你了…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 又经历了一次失败的婚姻吗？唉，有些事情确实无法避免。感觉之后会经常在酒吧见到你了……

Entries.DialogueText: 哎，你送来的蛋真是帮了大忙，能做出完美的煎蛋卷，你是大功臣！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎，你送来的蛋真是帮了大忙，能做出完美的煎蛋卷，你是大功臣！

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿，{Farmer_Name}！你能来真好。我负责酒吧，会做很多好喝的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿，！你能来真好。我负责酒吧，会做很多好喝的。

Entries.DialogueText: 回星露谷再见，{Farmer_Name}。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 回星露谷再见，。

Entries.DialogueText: 如果你想喝饮料的话，可以到酒吧找我。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果你想喝饮料的话，可以到酒吧找我。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿，来喝一杯吗？我使用岛上的特殊食材做了一些特别的饮料。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿，来喝一杯吗？我使用岛上的特殊食材做了一些特别的饮料。

Entries.DialogueText: 这些可能是我烹的最好的蟹肉饼了……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这些可能是我烹的最好的蟹肉饼了……

Entries.DialogueText: 是啊，我对这里的人很熟。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 是啊，我对这里的人很熟。

Entries.DialogueText: 这就是酒保的优势。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这就是酒保的优势。

Entries.DialogueText: 我听过的故事可多了去了……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我听过的故事可多了去了……

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿。我听说了你为潘姆做的事情。你真是大……大的好人！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿。我听说了你为潘姆做的事情。你真是大……大的好人！

Entries.DialogueText: 可悲的是，我认为这不会让她少喝“饮料”……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 可悲的是，我认为这不会让她少喝“饮料”……

Entries.DialogueText: 我今天早些时候遇见了潘姆……她正咧豁了嘴大笑！她说有人给她买了一间新房子！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我今天早些时候遇见了潘姆……她正咧豁了嘴大笑！她说有人给她买了一间新房子！

Entries.DialogueText: 不管是谁，他们真的值得最美的赞扬！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不管是谁，他们真的值得最美的赞扬！

Entries.DialogueText: 晚上好。需要点什么？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 晚上好。需要点什么？

Entries.DialogueText: 你好啊，{Farmer_Name}，请别拘束。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好啊，，请别拘束。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨，皮埃尔！/嗯，现在需要什么呢……/啊，那个看上去不错！/今晚做我的特制酱汁！/皮埃尔！有什么新产品吗？/皮埃尔！你给我带什么来了？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨，皮埃尔！/嗯，现在需要什么呢……/啊，那个看上去不错！/今晚做我的特制酱汁！/皮埃尔！有什么新产品吗？/皮埃尔！你给我带什么来了？

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨，{Farmer_Name}。见到你真高兴！在这儿，你永远是受欢迎的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨，。见到你真高兴！在这儿，你永远是受欢迎的。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨！在这里不要拘束哦。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨！在这里不要拘束哦。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿，来点喝的吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿，来点喝的吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 今晚的生意很不错。我很高兴。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 今晚的生意很不错。我很高兴。

Entries.DialogueText: 我每周都做不一样的菜哦，所以没事就过来看看吧！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我每周都做不一样的菜哦，所以没事就过来看看吧！

Entries.DialogueText: 没准能吃到极品美食哦。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 没准能吃到极品美食哦。

Entries.DialogueText: 有忌口的话尽管告诉我。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有忌口的话尽管告诉我。

Entries.DialogueText: 好的，回头见。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 好的，回头见。

Entries.DialogueText: 艾米丽在这工作一段时间了。没有她我真不知道该怎么办！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 艾米丽在这工作一段时间了。没有她我真不知道该怎么办！

Entries.DialogueText: 我可不想自己去刷锅。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我可不想自己去刷锅。

Entries.DialogueText: 潘姆和克林特几乎每晚都来酒吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 潘姆和克林特几乎每晚都来酒吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 假如他们不来我就要关门了！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 假如他们不来我就要关门了！

Entries.DialogueText: 所以可千万别把他们赶跑了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 所以可千万别把他们赶跑了！

Entries.DialogueText: 克林特每晚都来酒吧，自己一个人，坐的也是同一张桌子。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 克林特每晚都来酒吧，自己一个人，坐的也是同一张桌子。

Entries.DialogueText: 有时会紧张的看向艾米丽的方向。嗯……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有时会紧张的看向艾米丽的方向。嗯……

Entries.DialogueText: 这就是他常来的原因吧。哦，这也给我带来了不少生意。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这就是他常来的原因吧。哦，这也给我带来了不少生意。

Entries.DialogueText: 潘姆每晚都来酒吧喝很多啤酒。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 潘姆每晚都来酒吧喝很多啤酒。

Entries.DialogueText: 哦对了，我不该过多谈论顾客的事。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哦对了，我不该过多谈论顾客的事。

Entries.DialogueText: 你好啊！{Farmer_Name}。你要是口渴，可以去酒吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好啊！。你要是口渴，可以去酒吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 我自己平时不太喝酒。我开酒吧只是为了生计。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我自己平时不太喝酒。我开酒吧只是为了生计。

Entries.DialogueText: 不过我也确实很享受星露谷陈酿的香醇。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不过我也确实很享受星露谷陈酿的香醇。

Entries.DialogueText: 你厨艺怎么样，{Farmer_Name}？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你厨艺怎么样，？

Entries.DialogueText: 如果有厨房和菜谱，你就可以做出美味的料理啦。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 如果有厨房和菜谱，你就可以做出美味的料理啦。

Entries.DialogueText: 亲手烹饪的料理也是很好的礼物哦。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 亲手烹饪的料理也是很好的礼物哦。

Entries.DialogueText: 最近生意很稳定，真是多亏我的老顾客啊。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 最近生意很稳定，真是多亏我的老顾客啊。

Entries.DialogueText: 这种天气最适合享受一杯干涩的红酒了，对吧？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这种天气最适合享受一杯干涩的红酒了，对吧？

Entries.DialogueText: 我爱死我的工作了。哈哈哈。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我爱死我的工作了。哈哈哈。

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... what a beautiful day, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... what a beautiful day, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: You know, as the Saloon owner, I hear about everything that's going on in town.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, as the Saloon owner, I hear about everything that's going on in town.

Entries.DialogueText: I remember when you first moved here... everyone was a bit unsure of what to expect.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I remember when you first moved here... everyone was a bit unsure of what to expect.

Entries.DialogueText: A stranger from the city... an unknown personality... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A stranger from the city... an unknown personality...

Entries.DialogueText: One sec...
Entries.DisplayPattern: One sec...

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry, I have to stir this pot every 5 minutes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry, I have to stir this pot every 5 minutes.

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway, what was I saying? Oh yeah... you know, it's like when you're making a sauce...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway, what was I saying? Oh yeah... you know, it's like when you're making a sauce...

Entries.DialogueText: ...If you put in a new spice you could ruin everything! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...If you put in a new spice you could ruin everything!

Entries.DialogueText: ...But then again, there's always a chance you'll create something new and delicious! Right? Hahahaha. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But then again, there's always a chance you'll create something new and delicious! Right? Hahahaha.

Entries.DialogueText: Er... What I'm trying to say is... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er... What I'm trying to say is...

Entries.DialogueText: It's been great having you in town, and I've come to think of you as one of my good friends!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's been great having you in town, and I've come to think of you as one of my good friends!

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway, I came to give you something...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway, I came to give you something...

Entries.DialogueText: I was cleaning out the back room and I found this old Mini-Jukebox. I want you to have it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was cleaning out the back room and I found this old Mini-Jukebox. I want you to have it!

Entries.DialogueText: Received a 'Mini-Jukebox'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Received a 'Mini-Jukebox'

Entries.DialogueText: It's actually an old Do-It-Yourself project of mine, from many years ago. They're pretty easy to make!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's actually an old Do-It-Yourself project of mine, from many years ago. They're pretty easy to make!

Entries.DialogueText: So, just in case you wanted to make more, I brought the blueprints for you...
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, just in case you wanted to make more, I brought the blueprints for you...

Entries.DialogueText: Learned how to craft a 'Mini-Jukebox'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Learned how to craft a 'Mini-Jukebox'

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I'm gonna head home. I gotta get this marinara back on the stove! Have a good one!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I'm gonna head home. I gotta get this marinara back on the stove! Have a good one!

Entries.DialogueText: Great stuff!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Great stuff!

Entries.DialogueText: I still dream of that garlic butter.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I still dream of that garlic butter.

Entries.DialogueText: Me too!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Me too!

Entries.DialogueText: Wait. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wait.

Entries.DialogueText: I know what you were doing, Linus. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know what you were doing, Linus.

Entries.DialogueText: If you need food... just ask. I don't want anyone in Pelican Town to go hungry.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you need food... just ask. I don't want anyone in Pelican Town to go hungry.

Entries.DialogueText: Here. I've got a basket of zucchini fritters for you. Just make sure you dip them in my spicy marinara! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here. I've got a basket of zucchini fritters for you. Just make sure you dip them in my spicy marinara!

Entries.DialogueText: Go on... take it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Go on... take it.

Entries.DialogueText: Nice!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nice!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm all ears.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm all ears.

Entries.DialogueText: That sounds pretty good! I could use some quality veggies for the saloon. How much does it cost?
Entries.DisplayPattern: That sounds pretty good! I could use some quality veggies for the saloon. How much does it cost?

Entries.DialogueText: What was that?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What was that?

Entries.DialogueText: Hahaha... for a moment there, I thought I heard, '25,000g'. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hahaha... for a moment there, I thought I heard, '25,000g'.

Entries.DialogueText: Pierre, are you crazy? There's no way I could afford that. I'd have to sell the saloon! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pierre, are you crazy? There's no way I could afford that. I'd have to sell the saloon!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi. I'll take your order in a few moments.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi. I'll take your order in a few moments.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Unique}
There you go, sir. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There you go, sir.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hello there, buddy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hello there, buddy.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, .

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... I'm just looking over last month's earnings... and it's not looking very good, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... I'm just looking over last month's earnings... and it's not looking very good, .

Entries.DialogueText: The worst thing... and I hate to say this because she's my friend... is Pam! She hasn't paid off her tab in weeks! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The worst thing... and I hate to say this because she's my friend... is Pam! She hasn't paid off her tab in weeks!

Entries.DialogueText: ...But I can't ask her to do it. I know she'll get defensive, and I don't want to hurt her feelings. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But I can't ask her to do it. I know she'll get defensive, and I don't want to hurt her feelings.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, you gotta help me! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: , you gotta help me!

Entries.DialogueText: Er... Well, okay Pam. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er... Well, okay Pam.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, Pam! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, Pam!

Entries.DialogueText: And thank you, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: And thank you, .

Entries.DialogueText: Now, let's get you that drink, Pam. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, let's get you that drink, Pam.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for your help, {Farmer_Name}. This cash is going to be a big help to the saloon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for your help, . This cash is going to be a big help to the saloon.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!

Entries.DialogueText: Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, folks... once again, we're gathered for a very special occasion.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, folks... once again, we're gathered for a very special occasion.

Entries.DialogueText: ...A rare visit from a very dear friend...
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...A rare visit from a very dear friend...

Entries.DialogueText: ...My world-famous giant omelet! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...My world-famous giant omelet!

Entries.DialogueText: Zesty bell pepper, juicy tomato, rich mushroom, and tangy cheese... all enrobed in a blanket of rich, fluffy egg. Dig in, folks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Zesty bell pepper, juicy tomato, rich mushroom, and tangy cheese... all enrobed in a blanket of rich, fluffy egg. Dig in, folks.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy? What do you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy? What do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: Is that a good thing? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is that a good thing?

Entries.DialogueText: Nope... You can thank {Farmer_Name} over at %farm Farm!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nope... You can thank over at Farm!

Entries.DialogueText: Hooo~... Back at it again, huh Willy? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hooo~... Back at it again, huh Willy?

Entries.DialogueText: They look fresh all right...
Entries.DisplayPattern: They look fresh all right...

Entries.DialogueText: I'll take the whole lot! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll take the whole lot!

Entries.DialogueText: With a discount for the extra labor, of course...
Entries.DisplayPattern: With a discount for the extra labor, of course...

Entries.DialogueText: Looks like we got 'em all...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Looks like we got 'em all...

Entries.DialogueText: Psst... {Farmer_Name}... Don't tell Willy, but I'll be doing a special on crab cakes at the saloon for the next few days...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Psst... ... Don't tell Willy, but I'll be doing a special on crab cakes at the saloon for the next few days...

Entries.DialogueText: 想吃多少就吃多少！今天全部免费……镇长刘易斯的一份心意。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 想吃多少就吃多少！今天全部免费……镇长刘易斯的一份心意。

Entries.DialogueText: 噢！噢！别忘了在上面滴几滴我的秘制酱料。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 噢！噢！别忘了在上面滴几滴我的秘制酱料。

Entries.DialogueText: 同时操作四个烤架真累啊！今天有一大群饥肠辘辘的人要招待。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 同时操作四个烤架真累啊！今天有一大群饥肠辘辘的人要招待。

Entries.DialogueText: 我在肉饼里都加了我的特制风味酱。（眨眼暗示）
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我在肉饼里都加了我的特制风味酱。（眨眼暗示）

Entries.DialogueText: 南瓜可以搭配出很多种煮法。真是一种有趣的蔬菜。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 南瓜可以搭配出很多种煮法。真是一种有趣的蔬菜。

Entries.DialogueText: 我很擅长雕刻南瓜，镇上绝大部分南瓜灯都是我做的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我很擅长雕刻南瓜，镇上绝大部分南瓜灯都是我做的。

Entries.DialogueText: 我只要求把南瓜籽留给我……撒上一点肉桂糖，可好吃了！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我只要求把南瓜籽留给我……撒上一点肉桂糖，可好吃了！

Entries.DialogueText: 希望大家吃得开心……这些食物花了我好几天的功夫。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 希望大家吃得开心……这些食物花了我好几天的功夫。

Entries.DialogueText: 煎蛋、水煮蛋、荷包蛋、辣椒粉蛋、炒蛋、巧克力蛋……应有尽有！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 煎蛋、水煮蛋、荷包蛋、辣椒粉蛋、炒蛋、巧克力蛋……应有尽有！

Entries.DialogueText: 嘘……别告诉其他人——我今年打算做点不同的东西……用鸭蛋做蛋奶冻！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘘……别告诉其他人——我今年打算做点不同的东西……用鸭蛋做蛋奶冻！

Entries.DialogueText: 属于青蛙的季节就要到了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 属于青蛙的季节就要到了。

Entries.DialogueText: 你尝过蒲公英沙拉吗？这是我就地取材做的！ {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你尝过蒲公英沙拉吗？这是我就地取材做的！

Entries.DialogueText: 该死的沙蝇一直停靠在食物上！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 该死的沙蝇一直停靠在食物上！

Entries.DialogueText: 一个糟糕的食材，就会坏了一锅汤…… {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 一个糟糕的食材，就会坏了一锅汤……

Entries.DialogueText: “月光水母”……不知道尝起来味道如何？ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: “月光水母”……不知道尝起来味道如何？

Entries.DialogueText: 不过，我当然不会对它们下毒手的，嗯嗯，一定不会！ {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不过，我当然不会对它们下毒手的，嗯嗯，一定不会！

Entries.DialogueText: （深吸一口气）啊……大海的味道总能令人满足。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: （深吸一口气）啊……大海的味道总能令人满足。

Entries.DialogueText: 做糖拐杖是一门艺术。你得漫山遍野地寻找最适合的原料。这年头可难找了！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 做糖拐杖是一门艺术。你得漫山遍野地寻找最适合的原料。这年头可难找了！

Entries.DialogueText: 我通常用芬群岛果干做糖拐杖，这样才能保证质量。那亮丽的红色实在是太合适了……还是纯天然的！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我通常用芬群岛果干做糖拐杖，这样才能保证质量。那亮丽的红色实在是太合适了……还是纯天然的！

Entries.DialogueText: 哦，你想知道制作顶级双拐杖糖的秘诀？告诉你可以，不过一定要保密啊。*细语*在白色果糖里面加入一点点香草，再与樱桃混合就行了。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哦，你想知道制作顶级双拐杖糖的秘诀？告诉你可以，不过一定要保密啊。*细语*在白色果糖里面加入一点点香草，再与樱桃混合就行了。

Entries.DialogueText: 当然了，薄荷味拐杖糖也是很受欢迎的，所以我也会做很多这种口味的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 当然了，薄荷味拐杖糖也是很受欢迎的，所以我也会做很多这种口味的。

Entries.DialogueText: 喂，你看起来快要睡着了。你没事吧？ {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 喂，你看起来快要睡着了。你没事吧？

Entries.DialogueText: 吃吧！趁还新鲜热乎。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 吃吧！趁还新鲜热乎。

Entries.DialogueText: 我是挺想跟你仔细说说制作拐杖糖的新方法……不过今年就不说那些细枝末节了！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我是挺想跟你仔细说说制作拐杖糖的新方法……不过今年就不说那些细枝末节了！

Entries.DialogueText: 抱歉这儿没有吃的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 抱歉这儿没有吃的。

Entries.DialogueText: 请等待冬日星盛宴吧。保证你到时候吃到撑。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 请等待冬日星盛宴吧。保证你到时候吃到撑。

Entries.DialogueText: 我在室内窝得太久了，一直在看格球比赛……寒冬里能到外面透透气也是很好的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我在室内窝得太久了，一直在看格球比赛……寒冬里能到外面透透气也是很好的。

Entries.DialogueText: 你把这个送给我？我开心得不知道说什么了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你把这个送给我？我开心得不知道说什么了。

Entries.DialogueText: 噢，天哪！你真的送给我？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 噢，天哪！你真的送给我？

Entries.DialogueText: 不，不，不……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不，不，不……

Entries.DialogueText: 这完全是垃圾。你冒犯到我了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这完全是垃圾。你冒犯到我了。

Entries.DialogueText: 噢，这个不错。谢谢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 噢，这个不错。谢谢。

Entries.DialogueText: 我在电视上看到过它的广告。看起来真有趣！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我在电视上看到过它的广告。看起来真有趣！

Entries.DialogueText: 作为一名业余鉴赏家，我觉得对面食的怪异痴迷很搞笑。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 作为一名业余鉴赏家，我觉得对面食的怪异痴迷很搞笑。

Entries.DialogueText: 你看了《{0}》，才会有放假的感觉！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你看了《{0}》，才会有放假的感觉！

Entries.DialogueText: 真令人心动……不知何故，他们让传说中的水果看起来如此美味。我希望有一天能尝尝。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 真令人心动……不知何故，他们让传说中的水果看起来如此美味。我希望有一天能尝尝。

Entries.DialogueText: 他们说这部电影“不落俗套”……意思是不是说它不好？ {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 他们说这部电影“不落俗套”……意思是不是说它不好？

Entries.DialogueText: 那有什么意义？我不明白。也许我太老了。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 那有什么意义？我不明白。也许我太老了。

Entries.DialogueText: (嗅)(嗅)……我闻到了好吃的东西……
Entries.DisplayPattern: (嗅)(嗅)……我闻到了好吃的东西……

Entries.DialogueText: 一点也不糟糕。我真的很高兴我来了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 一点也不糟糕。我真的很高兴我来了！

Entries.DialogueText: 平时镇上举办节日的时候，吃的全都是我准备的，不过今天我就乐得清闲了！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 平时镇上举办节日的时候，吃的全都是我准备的，不过今天我就乐得清闲了！

Entries.DialogueText: 想吃点什么吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 想吃点什么吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 请进请进！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 请进请进！

Entries.DialogueText: 想要喝点什么吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 想要喝点什么吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 您需要点什么？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 您需要点什么？

Entries.DialogueText: 外面很冷，咖啡很暖和！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 外面很冷，咖啡很暖和！

Entries.DialogueText: 想要吃点热食吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 想要吃点热食吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 需要一杯热饮吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 需要一杯热饮吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 想要喝点什么吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 想要喝点什么吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 进来御寒吧！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 进来御寒吧！

Entries.DialogueText: 欢迎！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 欢迎！

Entries.DialogueText: 你似乎需要喝点东西。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你似乎需要喝点东西。
